comdey

dialogue.message: Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Hello, that's great what movies can you recommend me
Well that really depends, what types of movies do you like? if you have a particular genre in mind, I'm sure I can recommend you something.
Movies that I like, I would say I like action movies with some fighting or  films based on real events like the Devils Double
Ok that's great to know, what types of movies do you dislike or are not into.
I really hate horror and some romantic movies, they just bore me
That's great, before I can start recommending something, I just need to know will you be watching the movies alone, or with someone or some friends or family
Its just me, the wife and kids are out of town, so I just want to relax and watch some movies all day today, make the most
what types of movies do you usually watch, are you into things like Marvel, DC or Star Wars etc
I watched almost every Marvel film so I would say I'm a fan of Marvel compared to the other two
Is there any particular directors that you like or mood that you're in that your leaning a preference to watching right now
No particular directors I'm not that bothered about that, urm I'd say I want to watch a series of films back to back if possible

Based on what you've told me I would suggest the Indiana Jones series, the first film came out in 1981, it stars Harrison Ford. 

The film currently has 8.4 out of 10 from over 1,000,000 votes. 

Its an action adventure moves and has some fight scenes. 

The first film is called the raiders of the lost ark

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0082971/
Ok let me take a look

what do you think? 

Is there anything particular that you like?
I like that its got action and some fight scenes
That's great, there are five movies in total ands you could watch them back to back, do you have any streaming services that I can suggest thar you can view on
I have Netflix, Disney, Amazon Prime, Sky, Now and Paramount

users_mood: watch a series of films back to back

dialogue.message: Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Hi, I'm looking for a good science fiction film with action and special effects.
That's a good choice! Can I ask how old you are and if you don't mind violence or horror elements?
Sure, well I'm over 18 so I don't have an age restriction for myself but I may watch with family and teenagers so best not too violent!  horror is also not preferable.
OK, are there any preferred themes within the sci-fi genre such as outer space, future Earth etc.?
I love either of those, also time travel films and Star Trek, Star Wars etc.  Also Tom Cruise is popular in our house

Thanks that helps to narrow it down.  Have you seen Oblivion with Tom Cruise?  It's set in the future on Earth, here is more information:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oblivion_(2013_film)

There is an intriguing storyline and unexpected twists to keep you in suspense. It has a PG-13 rating so should be fine for watching with family.
Ok that sounds cool, what age rating is that?

It has a PG-13 rating so should be fine for watching with family! Another excellent option is Minority Report  from 2002:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Minority_Report_(film)

This film is highly rated on Rotten Tomatoes with a rating of 89% so is well worth checking out.
That definitely sounds like my kind of thing! Thanks.  I've also heard about Edge Of Tomorrow,  what do you think?
Are there any particular aspects you are excited about, such as the storyline, cast, or genre elements of this movie?
I like the fact that it has time travel elements and is set in various locations around the world
Thanks, I hope this was helpful to you for finding something exciting to watch with your family!  Have fun!
You too, good night!

frequently_watched: Science fiction with action and special effects

dialogue.message: Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Hi there, that  would be wonderful, thank you.
That would be my pleasure. In order to help me find you the perfect movie to watch, I will ask you a few questions. Firstly, who will you be watching the movie with?
I'll be watching with my wife
Great! And what genre will you be both looking for?
A comedy I think.
Are you after a family comedy or one with more adult humour?
One for grown-ups please
A great choice! There are many fantastic options that I can help you decide from. Do you have a favourite actor or actress?
Yes, we both really like Seth Rogen

They are certainly a great comedic actor, and have appeared in many brilliant movies. One I can highly recommend is Pineapple Express. Would that be of interest to you? https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0910936/?ref_=nv_sr_srsg_0_tt_5_nm_3_q_pineapp
Ah that would be a brilliant option. We have both seen it beforre, but many years ago. Thank you so much!
That is my pleasure. It is a higly rated movie with a score of 6.9 on IMDB. I'm glad to hear that it is a move you have previously liked watching, and I hope you enjoy doing so again.
Thank you so much for your support with this. You have helped to make a difficult decision easy.
Thank you to you too for your responses that helped me to make the suggestion. I really hope you enjoy the movie, and that I can be of assistance to you again in the future.
I'm sure you will. Bye!
One more question. What is it that you enjoy about Pineapple Express?
It is just a great movie with funny interraction between the two main stars,  Seth Rogen and James Franco
That's great information. Are you a fan of James Franco movies too?
Yes, he's a gerat actor and excels in roles in many different genres.
Hi again, I'm looking for advice on which movie to watch next, and as you were so helpful last time around I'd like to ask for your advice again

Hello once again! I'm delighted that I helped you
u successfully last time around, and that you feel that I can be helpful once more. Is it another comedy movie you are looking for?
Yes please, we enjoyed the last one so much that I think watching another would be good,
Great! Who will you be watching with this time?
With my wife once again.
Thank you. Last time around you both wanted an adult comedy that starred Seth Rogen, and you also mentioned that you liked James Franco too. Are you looking for something similar once again?
Yes please that sounds great.

Excellent. I think I have found the perfect movie that fit's the bill. https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1245492/?ref_=nv_sr_srsg_6_tt_7_nm_1_q_the%2520end

The End is a 2013 adult comedy, staring both Seth Rogen and James Franco. It is rated 6.6/10 on IMDB and is a very similar sort of movie to Pineapple Express.
Great, thank you!  Neither of us have seen that before, but it sounds ideal.
Hi there again. Can you give me some more advice on which movie to watch please?
Hello there once more. I would be delighted to help you with this. Can you start by letting me know what genre you are looking for. Will you be watching with your wife again too?
Thank you. I will be looking for a family comedy this time.  I will be watching with my wife, but also with our young children so the choice will need to be more family orientated.
Is this for a special occasion? How will you be watching it? On a streaming platform?
It is just as a treat for our children now that they have finished school for Christmas  Yes, having it on a streaming platform would be great.

Thank you for that. I think I can help with just the movie.

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0892782/?ref_=nv_sr_srsg_0_tt_8_nm_0_q_monsters%2520v

Monsters vs Aliens is a 2009 animated comedy. The movie scores a respectable 6.6/10 on IMDB and is available to stream on Prime Video and Apple TV.

The movie even features Seth Rogen, who I know from previous conversation is one of your favourite comedic actors, as the voice of one of the monsters, B.O.B.

Does that sound like a suitable movie for you all?
Yes, that sounds brilliant! I love that youo have found one with Seth Rogen in too!
I'm glad to have been able to help. As you like Seth Rogen, I thought it would help to make the movie just as appealing to you and your wife, as it does to your children.
That is very considerate and we really appreciate it. Thank you.
Thank you for your kind words,I am really glad to hear that you found my suggestions helpful and worthwhile. If I can ever help you again please just let me know. Good bye!
I sure will. Bye!
Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Hello!  I am looking for some horror movies to watch, but nothing to gory.
Do you have any content restrictions that you want to avoid such as R rated movies?
No, R rated movies are fine.  I just don't want to see excessive torture and suffering.
Will you be watching alone or with others?  If watching with others, what preferences do they have?
I will be watching by myself.
You said that you like horror movies.  Do you like psychological horror movies and documentaries?
Yes, I like both of them.  I like movies that make you think.
What do you think of the movie "Requiem for a Dream"?  It is a phycological horror movie.  It got a 8.3 out of 10 rating on IMDB here:  https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0180093/
I LOVE that movie.  Holy smokes that movie makes you think and feel.  It is real life horror movie without being gory.
What specifically did you like about the movie?
Oh man, I LOVED the soundtrack.  That soundtrack will haunt you forever.  The editing is out of this world.  It is a horror movie that depicts real life without all the gore.
It seems like that movie really hit the spot with you and is one of those movies that you will always remember.
Yes, it is shocking but yet real at the same time.  It isn't a documentary, but depicts real life fairly accurately.

users_mood: movies that make the user think and feel

dialogue.message: Hello.  I am hoping you can help me find more movies to watch.
Are you looking for any particular kinds of movies like horror?
I am looking for more movies directed by Darren Aronofsky.
You loved Requiem for a Dream that he directed!  Are you looking for similar movies that he directed?
Yes, try to find me movies similar to Requiem for a Dream that Darren Aronofsky directed.

What do you think about the movie "Black Swan"?  It was directed by Darren Aronofsky and came out in 2010.  Like Requiem for a Dream, it is also a psychological horror movie.  It has an 8.0 out of 10 rating on IMDB located here:  https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0947798/
That looks interesting and something that I could see myself watching.
What specific preferences that are found in Requiem for a Dream are you looking for in other Darren Aronofsky movies?
I am looking for psychological horror movies without gore and torture.  I also like unique editing in the movies and powerful soundtracks.
Thank you for your responses.  It was nice to get to know you.  I hope you enjoy Black Swan!
Thanks for your recommendations!

special_occasion: Movies similar to Requiem for a Dream

dialogue.message: Hello!  I am looking for another movie to watch.  This time I will be watching with my family.
What kind of movies do your family like watching?  Do they have any specific genre preferences?
They like watching light hearted comedies.
Okay so something that the whole family can enjoy together, including little kids?
Yes, a comedy that everyone of all ages can enjoy.

I would recommend the movie Major League 2.  It is a comedy about a hapless major league baseball team.  It is rated PG so it is suitable for the whole family.  The IMDB only ranks it as 5.6 out of 10 stars, but a lot of people find the movie hilarious.  You can see more here: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0110442/
That movie is perfect!  Our entire family are big sports fans so everyone will enjoy this.
What is it about Major League 2 that appeals to you and your family?
Everyone in our family are big sports fans so we can all relate to the movie.  It is a family comedy so everyone of all ages will enjoy it since it is only rated PG.  We all like to laugh too!
I am glad that I could help you.  Your enthusiasm is contagious.  I hope you and your family enjoy the movie.
I'm sure that we will.  Thanks for all your help!

At home

What interests you about the movie 'It Follows' ?
It looks scary and has an actress I like in it
Thank you for letting me help you choose a movie. Is there anything else I can help you with?
No thanks
Hello again
Hello again user. What can I help you with?
I'm looking for other scary movie recommendations
Sure, are you looking for something similar to 'It Follows'?
Yes
Will you be watching the movie alone?
Yes
I have found some other scary movie that have Maiko Monroe in them. Have a look here https://www.dreadcentral.com/editorials/431348/all-of-maika-monroes-best-horror-performances-ranked/
Wow. Thank you
You're welcome. As 'The guest' is rated number 1, I would recommend you watch this
I will definitely consider it
I'm glad I could help you today. Is there anything else I can help you with?
No
I hope you enjoy watch the movie
Thanks
You are welcome. Goodbye
Bye
Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Hello thank you for the opportunity to use your advice today!
Thank you, I'll be glad to assist you this evening. Could you tell me about your preferred movie viewing occasions and any specific requests that you are looking for?
Tonight I'm looking for a movie to watch with my significant other. We mostly enjoy horror movies or psychological thrillers.
Are there any specific content restrictions that you and your significant other have when watching movies together to ensure that my recommendations are fitting for your preferences?
We don'
Sorry that response seemed incomplete could you say that again?
We don't have any restrictions for movies that we watch together. Anything is fine.
What are some other genres that you both are interested other than Horror and Psychological Thrillers?
We occasionally are interested in romance movies but it is rare. Comedy in the horror genre is also usually good for us too.
What is the current mood or atmosphere that you are in to watch movies? It could help with my recommendations for you.
I think that we are in the mood for something that is scary tonight, a good horror movie seems like the right choice.

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt10638522/

I searched for new scary horror movies and this one sounded like it would fit perfectly for you and your significant other to watch. From the little that I've read reviewers say that this is one of the scariest newer horror films. It follows a group of friends that play around with the occult and contact the spirit world through a mysterious ceramic hand. The reviewer also said that it is unnerverving and tense which fits with your interests in psychological thrillers as well. Have you already seen this film or have any feedback on my recommendation for you?
I have not seen Talk to me yet but I did remember seeing about it and it looked like one that we would enjoy. I think that is a great recommendation. Thank you.
No problem, I am always here to help and appreciate that you are so interested in my recommendation. What in particular attracts you to the recommended movie?

I think the thing that looks most interesting about this film is that the focus on the scariness in it is more than just jump scares and it seems original and fresh compared to most other recent horror films.
Thank you for your appreciation of my recommendation and your positive feedback. I hope that you have a good night and enjoy your movie with your significant other!
Thank you and I hope to use you again in the future for another recommendation

users_mood: in the mood for something scary
interested in scariness beyond jump scares

dialogue.message: Hello again
Hello are you interested in watching movies at home, travelling or any other occasion? Do you have any specific movie requests?
I would like to watch another movie with the same director or actress as the previous recommendation
I will look for another movie for you with the same director or actress as Talk to me.
Thank you I enjoyed their work and would like to see something else with someone familiar from that film.
Did you have a specific actor/actress or director in mind from the previous film?
Either of the directors Danny or Michael Philippou or the main actress Sophie Wilde
Which would you prefer the actress Sophie Wilde or the directors Danny and Michael Philippou?
I think it may be easier to find something else with Sophie because I remember seeing that this was the directors first film.

The Portable Door is the only other movie of Sophie Wilde's that I could find. 

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt11820950/

This film is much different than your previous film that you enjoyed, Talk to me, however it has Sophie as one of the main characters which is what you are interested in. It is an adventure, comedy and fantasy film that is appropriate for the family. What do you think of this recommendation?

It doesn't seem at all like something we normally would watch besides with my significant other's child but it does sound interesting and we would like to see her in something else so it seems like a good recommendation.
What specifically makes you interested in seeing another film with Sophie Wilde in it?
Her acting was really good in Talk to me and I was curious how she would be in another film in a different kind of role so this movie looks interesting.
Thank you for your interest in my recommendation and I hope that you and your significant other enjoy this film as well!
Thank you again and looking forward to future recommendations from you!
Thank you for your feedback and I'm excited to provide future recommendations!
I'm looking for a movie to watch with my significant other and her son for Christmas this time.

users_mood: curious about actress Sophie Wilde in different roles

dialogue.message: Hello again

Hello what are your preferences for viewing a movie this time. Will you be watching this one at home, while traveling or for any other occasions and you you have any specific requests that will help with your movie recommendations?
I am looking for a movie to watch at home tonight with my significant other and her son tonight. We are looking for a funny Christmas movie.
What is your mood for a Christmas movie? Who are your viewing companions and what platform do you have available for streaming?
Something cheerful and funny. I will be watching with my significant other and her son. We have access to all the major streaming platforms or renting a film.

The Grinch 2018 https://www.imdb.com/title/tt2709692/

This film fits the criteria that you ask for of a Christmas movie that is cheerful and funny. It is also suitable for both children and adults. Does this recommendation sound good for you and do you have any feedback on it?
That looks perfect. I've always loved the grinch films and this one is my favorite of them. It is modern so it would relate better to my significant others son and would be enjoyable for all 3 of us.
What specific parts of The Grinch 2018 do you find most appealing for your movie night? Is there something about this movie that you think will resonate with your significant other's son?

I love the story of the grinch going from hating Christmas to enjoying it and finding a new family at the end instead of feeling alone. I think the positive story will resonate with my significant other's son and he will also enjoy the humor in it.
Thank you for your feedback and excitement with my selection for you. I hope that you and your family have a wonderful movie night and a merry christmas!
Thank you and you as well!
Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Im in the mood for a good family movie night, any suggestion for a movie themed around xmas>
Gearing up for a Christmas movie night! Got any preferences to what you would like ? Carton or drama?
Thankyou! im excited about a xmas movie, im leaning towards kid friendly with lots of laughter,
How about we go for a classic like "Elf". It's super kid-friendly, packed with laughs, and has that perfect holiday spirit. What do you think?
That sounds great!!!  do you happen to have another just as a back of movie.
Absolutely! If you're in the mood for another kid-friendly Christmas movie, you might enjoy "Home Alone."
Omg yes thank you thats a really good classic movei as well
Is there anything more I can help you with today?
any suggestions on some quick xmas snacks?
Certainly! For quick and festive Christmas snacks, how about, how about some holiday popcorn tossed with some red and green M&M, simplistic and easy to make to go with your movie night.
OMG yes that is such a great idea ... thank you!!!
Is there anything else i can assist you with today
yes where can i get the movie elf?

Certainly i can help you with this . Here is a perfect place you can rent the movie.
https://www.amazon.com/Elf-Will-Ferrell/dp/B09PQ88296
how about the other movie?
Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Hello, I want to watch a movie tonight, I am by myself and I'm interested in comedy. I want to laugh tonight!
Oh that sounds good. are there any content restrictions that you want to apply. Is there a specific comedy genre you like? such as romantic comedy or action comedy?
No, I don't have any restrictions, but I am not interested in any action movies even if they include comedy. Romantic comedy sounds good, let's go with that.
You said you're watching alone, is that correct? also do you have any specific preferences such as actors, actresses or directors of romantic comedies?
That is correct, I am watching alone. as far as preferences, I like Jennifer Lopez, I enjoyed a couple of her movies in the past.
Sounds great! may I ask how will you be watching the movie, are you streaming it with any specific platform?Also are you in a good mood now, especially being alone.
Oh, I feel great, I am very happy now. I will be watching the movie on Netflix

I have a great recommendation for a romantic comedy movie starring Jennifer Lopez called monster-in-law, but it is not available on Netflix. Would you like to know where else it's available for streaming, or would you like to see something else by Jennifer Lopez on Netflix but is not of the requested genre?
Monster-in-law is good, I also have Apple Tv, is it available there for me to watch it?
Yes it is available on Apple Tv, do you prefer that platform? is it your favorite for watching movies?
Yeah I enjoy watching a lot of movies on Apple Tv, so I want to watch Monster in Law there
I'm glad you found a movie you want to enjoy on one of your favorite platforms. I hope you enjoy the movie Monster in Law on Apple Tv and have a great night.
I'm sure I will, thank you so much for your help.
hello, how are you today?

I'm well how are you? what can I help you with today for your movie pleasures? are you at home or what's your favorite place and time to watch a movie? Do you have a specific movie or request you need help with?

I'm great, thanks. I enjoy watching movies at home an night after work or on weekends. That is my favorite time and place for enjoying movies. I enjoyed the last Jennifer Lopez movie so I want to checkout another one of hers.

Okay, great another Jennifer Lopez movie. Does it have to be newly released or can it be from one of her past movies from previous years. Also if you don't min, may I ask what platforms you have available to watch the movie?
Great questions! It could be any Jennifer Lopez movie, past or current, and in terms of Platforms, I have Netflix, Apple Tv and I Youtube.
Wonderful! now are you watching the movie alone or with a companion? Also how is your mood now, how are you feeling? what's the theme of the movie you want to see?
I'm all alone but I'm in a great happy mood so I can stand to watch a thriller or drama movie.

Great. I found a newly released Jennifer Lopez movie that is available on Netflix. It is called The Mother, it is a thriller movie. here's the link https://www.netflix.com/title/80210920. Let me know if it sounds good.
That sounds perfect, just the type of movie I want to see.
May I ask what makes you so excited and eager to see this movie The Mother. How does it fit into your current mood?
First of all it stars Jennifer Lopez and I enjoy many of her movies and since I'm in a good mood I usually like to watch thriller movies and the night is really good for that.
It has been a pleasure to help you find the movie you would enjoy watching. I hope you have a wonderful movie night.
I'm sure I will, thank you for all your help.
Hello again, I hope you are well. I need help with a movie recommendation for a family with young kids.
Hi, so you are planning on enjoying a movie with your young kids and family? will you be watching at home or somewhere else? is there a specific occasion for this movie time?

yes the movie is for the whole family including my young kids. We are not home, we are actually traveling and since it is raining and we cannot leave the hotel, we want to enjoy a movie inside our hotel room.

I found a good movie that the kids will enjoy. It is family friendly and is available on Apple TV which you can stream from your hotel room. The movie is packed with comedy and exciting scenes the whole family will enjoy. Here's the link for it on Apple TV https://tv.apple.com/us/movie/kung-fu-panda/umc.cmc.34elthhr2qybuu3emdzn4d2fr?action=play. Let me know how that sounds.
Oh Kung Fu Panda movie! that sounds good, I'm sure the kids will like it and we can all enjoy it together on this rainy night.
Nice! what do you think the kids will like about the movie? what about you, why is it appealing to you?

I'm sure the kids will like it since it involves talking animals which they will love and is appropriate for their age. I like that it is a comedy movie which I enjoy watching a lot, so it is a good fit for the whole family.

Sounds wonderful, I am glad that I was able to help you find a movie that your whole family will enjoy during your travel. I hope you all have a wonderful night and enjoy the movie. Once again, thank you for your time and it has been a pleasure to assist you.
You have been wonderful and a great help, I thank you for your time and help as well. I'm sure we will all have a great time enjoy this movie.
Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Hi there, looking for a film to watch tonight, but can’t find anything, what do you recommend?
what kind of movies do you like to watch?
I like comedy films, I don’t like horror films or musicals
Do you like to watch films alone or with others? What kind of comedies do you like? Slapstick or satire?
I like to watch laugh out loud comedies and also witty comedy films.
What kind of comedy are you in the mood for? Do you have any favourite comedy actors? Or any types of comedies in particular?
I would like a laugh out loud comedy. I like films with Steve Martin in, and also Bill Murray.

If you like laugh out loud movies and Steve Martin I would recommend the film Planes Trains and automobiles, it’s one of the best and funniest films I know. Here’s the link https://www.google.co.uk/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=&ved=2ahUKEwiryeSWsqCDAxUhT0EAHWVtDIQQFnoECFUQAQ&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.imdb.com%2Ftitle%2Ftt0093748%2F&usg=AOvVaw33prEy8aUoSS8AhLRNi9tn&opi=89978449

Also if you like Bill Murray films, one of his earliest was Caddyshack, it’s a classic. Here’s the link for this one
https://www.google.co.uk/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=&ved=2ahUKEwiQypG4sqCDAxUJRkEAHZ44B6YQFnoECCcQAQ&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.imdb.com%2Ftitle%2Ftt0080487%2F&usg=AOvVaw2IFiQULVoRoAafzTY1iOs1&opi=89978449
That’s great I will check both of these out!
Why do you think you will like these movies? What aspect do you think you would like?

I have seen Planes trains and automobiles before, so know I will like this one. I have not seen Caddyshack before but I have heard good things about it and know that I like bill murray films, so I would like to see it.
I’m glad you’re interested in watching these films, I’m sure you will enjoy them, I think they will make you laugh out loud!
Thanks for your help. Bye
Hello again, I really liked the Bill Murray film, are there any other films you can recommend?
I’m glad you enjoyed it. Are you in the mood for the same kind of comedy or are you after a film with the same actor in? Will you be watching alone or with others?
I generally just like anything he is in. I will be watching alone, so don’t mind if it’s more serious as long as there is some humour in it.
Are there any other actors or directors you enjoy alongside Bill Murray, is if for a special occasion or anything in particular?
Well, I did want to watch a film to put me in a Christmas mood, so I’m hoping to find something with good cheer!

A classic Christmas movie I think you would like is Scrooged. It stars Bill Murray in a modern day take on the classic A Christmas Carol. It will put you in a festive mood, as well as make you think.
Here’s the link
https://www.google.co.uk/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=&ved=2ahUKEwjS3KnvtqCDAxWTSUEAHSL9ApUQFnoECFwQAQ&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.imdb.com%2Ftitle%2Ftt0096061%2F&usg=AOvVaw1cUjvfOfQ2ooJX3LfRWQro&opi=89978449

If you want a more recent film, but also more serious, I would definitely recommend the movie St Vincent. It’s not a Christmas film but it’s a feel good movie with a serious side to it. It also has its slapstick moments.
Here’s the link for this one
https://www.google.co.uk/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=&ved=2ahUKEwjeppKrt6CDAxVqVUEAHWgZASAQFnoECF8QAQ&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.imdb.com%2Ftitle%2Ftt2170593%2F&usg=AOvVaw0a4WNQmJfYGIzc_mdfIRN0&opi=89978449
I’ve seen Scrooged before, that’s a good one to recommend, I would like to watch this one. I have also seen St Vincent and I agree that it’s a good film, but maybe not today. Thanks
What was it you like about Scrooged? Were there any moments in the film that appealed to you? Was it just the actors or was there anything else you liked?
I liked the Christmas message and the overall tone of the film. The acting is great and I liked the nod to a Christmas carol. I really enjoyed the original with Alistair Sim.

I’m happy that you enjoyed my recommendations and hope you will enjoy watching the film again, and it puts you in a festive mood!
Please just ask if you would like anymore recommendations. bye for now!
Thank you, bye.

movie_like: A Christmas Carol with Alistair Sim

dialogue.message: Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Hi, can you recommend a good action move starring Arnold Schwarzenegger?

I hope you are well. I certainly can help you with that but first can you let me know a bit more about your circumstances? Are you hoping to watch this movie at home, at a movie theater or while traveling?
Oh I would like to watch this move at home using my home theater setup.

I see, that sounds excellent. Will you be watching alone or with family or friends? Will there be any younger viewers present. If any of the other viewers have concerns about violence or bad language I will need to know that before recommending a film that's suitable.

I was planning on watching the film with my family and two of my eldest sons friends will be there as well. The youngest is 15 and my wife and I don't mind violence and bad language as long as the film isn't rated 18.

You asked for an action film starring Arnold Schwarzenegger. That is quite a specific criteria, would you be open to any other movie stars in the action genre? Arnold hasn't been making many movies recently so there aren't many recent action films I can suggest starring him and many of his older action films have an 18 rating.

I was hoping to introduce my son to Arnold as he was one of my favourite stars of my younger years. Is there a film that he starred in back in the 1980's or 1990's that is action packed but is rated 15 or under?

There certainly are a few very successful movies from Arnold's career in those decades that your family would enjoy. Would you prefer a film that is a sequel to an older one or something that is a contained in one story?
I think it would be better if the movie didn't require the viewers to have any prior knowledge in order to get the best from the story, Although some may have seen the older films, others may not.

I would like to recommend True Lies.
https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0111503/
This film from 1994 was directed by James Cameron and stars Arnold as secret agent who has to save his wife and child from a deadly terrorist group. It wasn't a sequel and has some incredible action scenes that still look amazing today. I think your family will enjoy this very much and allows you to introduce them to the type of action films that you enjoyed when you were young.
Let me know what you think about this choice, if you would like a different movie I can recommend a suitable alternative for you.
I think that sounds perfect, it ticks all my boxes and I should be able to find it on one of the streaming platforms to rent.

I am glad you like this recommendation. Can you let me know why you feel that it ticks all your boxes? I can supply you with an alternative if you find the theme of the film disturbing or the violence too shocking?

I think from memory that True Lies has a very strong comedic plot that will offset some of the more violent scenes with a good laugh so it will suit the teenagers present and I think my wife and I and our friends will enjoy seeing this blast from the past again as it's been many years since we last saw it in the theatre.
Thank you for your feedback, it's been a real pleasure chatting with you and I hope you and your family and friends enjoy the move True Lies. Good bye.
Thanks for your help, it's much appreciated. Bye
Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Hi! I need to find a movie to watch tonight
Sure, happy to help. Are there any particular genres you're interested in?
My friend really likes horror movies so I think that would be best
That could be a great idea. Are you watching the movie with this friend, or alone?
She's coming to my house this evening so we'll be watching it together
OK, have you watched many movies together before? Do either of you have any preferences when it comes to types of horror movie?
No real preferences. We watched the most recent Saw movie last time, which was OK but not very memorable

Sure, let's try something a bit different for your next movie. This is one of the highest rated movies of 2023: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt23289160/?ref_=sr_t_1
Take a look and let me know what you think
That is very highly rated, I haven't seen any of the Godzilla movies before but i think we'll give it a shot. I'll let my friend know

Well it's a big franchise and it looks really good. Giant monsters must be pretty exciting
I'm glad you like the recommendation. Hopefully you and your friend will enjoy it!
I hope so too! Appreciate the recommendation
Hi, thanks for the last recommendation! We both enjoyed it a lot
That's great to hear. Do you want another recommendation?
Yes, I'm seeing my friend again tomorrow and we want to watch something similar
Cool, so something similar to the last movie? Any other special requests for the movie night?
I don't really mind. Maybe something in a similar style to the last movie
What mood are you both in?
I'd like to get absorbed in a good story

Here's one you can try: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt2404217/?ref_=nm_knf_t_1
It's by the same director as the last movie you enjoyed, so I think you'll like it. Have a look at the synopsis and let me know what you think
Never heard of this before but it sounds interesting, I'll give it a shot
What do you like about it?
The historical setting seems intriguing
I'm glad you like it. Hope you have a great night watching it!
Thanks again.

Unfortunately not, so I'll just go for whatever the most popular movies are for kids right now. They are 8 and 10

it should be perfect for kids, and you may enjoy it too. Let me know what you think.

dialogue.message: Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Thanks! I'm interested in watching something that is like a sit com and has more than 4 seasons.
Awesome! So you are interested in a show that is a sit com and has more than 4 seasons?
Yes that is what I am looking for. I would prefer there to not be too much gore. I dislike blood.
Understood. Are you interested in seasonal movies? There are many that have comic relief and do not include any gore.
Yes that would be perfect! If the movie is family friendly even better!
Ok! Because you indicated you enjoy sit com style shows that are longer with a seasonal theme that is suitable for the family - a few movies come to mind. How long of a movie would you prefer?
I would prefer something that is longer than an hour but shorter than 3 if possible. A little over is ok but not by too much.
That makes good sense! What platforms do you have available to you so I can narrow your movie search?
I have hbo max, netflix, amazon prime, and hulu!

Here are two options! One is Elf which is offered on Hulu and HBO Max. It is approximately 1.5 hours and is seasonal. It currently has a 7.1/10 rating on IMDB. Here is a link: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0319343/.

Another option is Home Alone which is offered on Hulu and is seasonal as well. It has been nominated for 2 Oscars.It currently has a 7.7/10 rating on IMDB and is approximately 1.7 hours long. The IMDB link is: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0099785/?ref_=fn_al_tt_1
Great! They both sound awesome! I will check them out!
Fantastic! Is there anything else I can help with?
Nope! Thank you so much!
Have a great day!
Thanks! You too!
Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Hi, that's great. I've been racking my brains trying to figure out what to  watch later and I'm coming up empty. What do you suggest?
Before I can make a recommendation, I need to ask some questions to determine you preferences. Would it be okay If I asked some probing questions?
Eh, sure, I guess, ask away.
First, is there any sort of film you don't want to see right now, or more generally, is there any content restrictions you wish to impose on my recommendations?
No content restrictions, per se, but I'm in the mood to laugh so make sure it's a comedy.
What would be your preferred genre, and will you be watching the movie in company or alone?
Just by myself tonight, and I told you it has to be a comedy.
So, what sort of movies do you typically watch, and why do you enjoy comedies in particular?
In particular? I just wanna watch a funny movie tonight, that's all.
Oh, I see, why is it that you are in the mood for a comedy tonight?
I'm having a stress-filled day at work and I wanna decompress with a funny film later.

How about Office Space (1999), a satirical comedy poking fun at office culture and corporate culture. The film is considered a cult classic, and was written and directed by Mike Judge, who also created Beavis and Butthead, King of the Hill, and Silicon Valley. More information about the film can be found here, https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0151804. Let me know if this film works for you or if you would like me to continue making recommendations? Oh, okay, you want a film that will make you laugh and help you unwind?
Can you resend the link please, that one's not working?
Sorry about that, try this one: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0151804/
Yeah, that looks like exactly what I'm after. Thanks for your help.
I'm glad that I could be of service and do hope you will enjoy the movie and forget about work for a while. If you ever again need help picking a film to watch please reach out. Happy movie watching!
Will do, will do. Thanks again and goodbye.

movie_like: Office Space (implied by the IMDb link provided)

dialogue.message: Hi again.
Hi there, and how can I help with your movie-viewing experience today?
Well, do you remember last time you recommended the film Office Space?
Yes, I remember, Office Space, written and directed by Mike Judge and released to theaters in 1999. Did you enjoy watching it and unwinding from work?
I did, thanks. When you recommended it to me, you also mentioned a few TV shows he made, but could you now tell me if he made any more movies, prefereably something similar to Office Space?

He also directed the 2006 film Idiocracy, a satirical look at a dystopian future of rampant consumerism and an ever-dumber population and culture. Like Office Space it is considered a cult classic. Let me know if this movie meets your needs. More information can be found here: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0387808/
Yes, that looks like just the thing. Thanks!
I'm glad that I could help you once again. Is there anything else you would like help with?
No, that will do me.
Very good, until next time so.
Thanks, bye.
You are very welcome and goodbye.
Bye
How do.
Hello again. How can I be of assistance today?
I've got some friends coming over later and I can't decide what to watch.
Do you know what sort of movies your friends like to watch?
Oh sorry, no, I should have said. We all decided we should watch a horror movie but I can't decide on which one to pick.
Your recent watch history has included comedies like Office Space and Idiocracy. Would you be interested in a film that mixes the horror and comedy genres?
Hmm, that might be interesting. Just not any of the Scary Movie or Scream movies, we've seen them a bunch of times.
Is there any particular types of horror films or sub-genres that interest you or your friends?
Eh, maybe something with zombies or vampires.

Zombies or vampires, that's good to know. Two films stand out to me. For zombies, you can't go wrong with Shaun of the Dead, a gory comedy from the minds of Edgar Wright and Simon Pegg. See IMDB for more information https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0365748/

On the other hand if you're more in the mood for vampires (with some bonus werewolves) then maybe you'd prefer What We Do in the Shadows, a 2014 New Zealand film directed by Jemaine Clement and Taika Waititi. More information can be found here: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt3416742/
Oh, two good choices. You know what I think we'll make it a double feature and watch both

cultural_preferences_like: Horror movies with zombies or vampires

My favourite genres are comedy and musicle. I'd like to avoid sad and gorey films
Comedy and musicle sounds lovely! May I ask you who are you planning to watch the film with?
Me, my husband and daughter (she's 10), my sister in law and nephew (he's 9)

No cultural preferences, we respect all cultures

Hmmm let me think... both my husband and nephew like Arnold Schwarzenegger

Please check the following link

Would you like me to recommend you similar movies?

I really hope you and your family will like this lovely action comedy!

Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Hello :)

Hi there! To start off would you mind letting me know your vieweing preferences? Whether it would be to watch a film at home, while travelling or on other occasions?

Also do you have any category preferences for example, action, comedy etc?
I think i would prefer to watch a movie whilst in the comfort of my own home.

Are there any prefered genres you would like to watch or any genres you would prefer not to watch at home?

Will the movie need to be family friendly or are there any other content restrictions?
I think I would like to watch a light hearted comedy movie. I am going to be watching the film with friends and we havent really got any restrictions
Are there any specific comedy genres you would like to view? Something like a romantic comedy or something alike?
I think we would like to watch an action adventure style movie that has some comedy bits in it. I guess something like Jumanji would be good
Are there any specific directiors or actors you would like to see in the movie?
I dont really mind what director made the film. Any actors are ok for me they dont have to be top stars. Just a fun movie will do

Based on your preferences I would recomment 21 Jump Street which you can find more information about here: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1232829/. 

Its a mix of action, crime and comedy. The film is about a pair of underachieving cops who are sent back to a local high school to blend in and bring down a synthetic drug ring.

What do you think of this recommendation?
That sounds like a good film, I like Channing Tatum and Jonah Hill.  It sounds like something that all my friends would like aswell

Thats great to hear! Im glad I could help you find something to watch. 

If you dont mind telling me, what about the film fits your preferences? Additionally what is it about Channing Tatum and Jonah Hill that you like?

Thank you! The synopsis sounds good and after watching the trailer it looked like something we all wanted to watch. As for Channing and Jonah they are both very good actors and I remember seeing them in some other movies previously which they did well in. They also looked like they had good chemistry during the trailer too.

No problem! Thank you for providing feedback on my recommendation.

Is there anything else that I can help you with today?
I think thats all thank you. Thanks for the assistance!
Hello again! Ive come back for another movie recomendation :)

Hello there! 

Do you have any specific requests? Are you planning to go to the cinema or watch a movie at home?
I am planning to watch a movie at home on christmas eve with my family.  Im looking for a film that stars channing tatum
Ok, do you have any specific themes or genres you would like? And do you mind when the film was released?

It would be nice if it could be a classic comedic christmas movie. I  dont mind when the film was released although it would be nice if it was a more recent one as we have seen alot of christmas movies across the year and wouldnt want to see one we already have seen before

Sorry but I cant find any christmas movies that star channing tatum.

However I have found an alternative movie that should fit your preferences.

Best. Christmas. Ever! is a christmas movie being released this year. The synopsis for this film is: "Friendships are put to the ultimate test over a boastful holiday newsletter.". You can find more information about the film here: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt7038762/?ref_=ttls_li_tt

What do you think of this film?

Thats a shame that he isnt in any christmas movies. Ive had a look at that movie and it looks like it would be pretty good. I think Ill give that one a go. Do you have any other recommendations just incase we dont like that film?
Is there anything about that film that you are concerned about liking or disliking?
A few of the reviews about the film are putting me off although I would still like to try watching it

Ok Im glad you liked the suggestion. If that film doesnt work then you could try this one instead "EXmas" https://www.imdb.com/title/tt29536228/?ref_=ttls_li_tt.

"Graham surprises his family at Christmas only to discover his ex-fiancee is already celebrating the holiday with his family when he arrives."

This film could serve as an alternative.

Im glad I could help you out today. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
Thanks for providing me with an alternative! I think thats all I needed help with thank you :)

Hello! Where are you planning to watch a movie today, at home or in the cinema?

I am planning to go to the cinema with one close friend. We are hoping to see a good action movie

nothing more really. Just an action movie with Tom cruise would be good. I think a more recent one would be good

I think you would like the most recent Mission Impossible movie "Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part One" -https://www.imdb.com/title/tt9603212/.

Its another classic Tom Cruise action movie that expands on the Mission Impossible franchise.
Oh that looks good I didnt know that there was a new Mission impossible movie out. I will go and see that one they are always good fun
Is there anything particular about the new Mission impossible movie that you like? Whether it be the action sequences or the storyline?

Ive grown up watching Mission Impossible movies and Tom Cruise always does a good job acting in them. the action sequences are usually very big in scale and are performed really well. The story lines are usually similar from movie to movie but they always manage to create a great movie

Im glad you liked my recommendation! 

Is there anything else I can help you with today?
No problem. Thats all thank you I dont need any further help!

Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Hi, thankyou, that would be very helpful. I don't really know much about which films are worth watching these days!
No problem! Let's work together and find you the perfect film to watch. I just want to get an idea of what you fancy, so who will you be watching with and what genres do you usually enjoy?
My wife and I are having a 'date night' so it would be nice to find something we would both enjoy. We're not big fans of rom-coms, so would like something with a good amount of action!
Super, I feel like we're getting somewhere! Just checking, are there any restrictions at all, like age, sex or violence?
No, no restrictions
Ok great, so we've decided no rom-coms and that you want a bit of action. Are we talking full on violence / car chase action? or maybe some horror action? what about superhero action?
definitely not horror! I am a big wimp and can't do horror films! We do love a good superhero film if there are any new ones to watch?
Great! are you looking for a more recent option? perhaps something including Marvel or DC superheroes? or would you prefer a classic option, maybe an old school batman for example?

I have watched all the old classics, so a more recent one would be great. I love the Marvel films,  but am a bit behind. I haven't seen any since the last avengers film. are there more that have come out since?

There sure are! There are a few options for you, depending on which superhero takes your fancy. We've got Black Widow, Spiderman, Shang-Chi, Eternals, Doctor Strange, Thor, Black Panther, Ant-man or Guardians of the Galaxy. Do any of those appeal? if so I can give you a link to find out a bit more
oo I absolutely LOVE guardians of the galaxy. I feel like that would work for my wife and I, a nice bit of humour and plenty of action! Whats the name of that film??

Sounds like this will be a great fit for you and your wife. You can always rely on the Guardians of the galaxy to provide that bit of humour! Here is a link to the latest Guardians film (Guardians of the galaxy Vol 3) there is a trailer there and a bit more info for you to check if it meets your needs. https://www.imdb.com/title/tt6791350/
I think this is the perfect option. The trailer looks great!
I'm so glad we have found the perfect film for you and your wife to enjoy! I hope you have a great evening and love the film! Thanks for trusting me to help you out.
Thank you very much for your help!

I will, thank you for all your help!

oh definitely! We can have a nice 30 mins as a family and all get some enjoyment out of this one
Fabulous, sounds like this may be the perfect choice! I really hope you all have a great Christmas
thank you so much, you too!

dialogue.message: Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Hi, I am wanting to watch a Christmas film with my family of older children , what would you recommend?
Certainly I can help with that.  In order to find the best films for you is there any type of film you do not want to watch, for example a horror film
No, we like any sorts of films, perhaps a dark Christmas comedy might be interesting?
Are you interested in an older film or something more modern?
Definitely a more recent film I think.  We also like animations.
In order to help you could you let me know which streaming platforms you currently have access to.
We currently have Now, Netflix and Disney.
I think your family would enjoy Bad Santa currently showing on Now  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bad_Santa#Plot
We also have amazon prime is there any dark comedies you could recommend on there.
I have another dark comedy I recommend.  Have you seen Krampus https://www.imdb.com/title/tt3850590/
That sounds interesting what it that about

When his dysfunctional family clashes over the holidays, young Max (Emjay Anthony) gets disillusioned and turns his back on Christmas. Meanwhile, this lack of festive spirit unleashes the wrath of Krampus: a demonic force of ancient evil intent on punishing non-believers. All hell breaks loose as beloved holiday icons take on a monstrous life of their own, laying siege to the fractured family's home and forcing them to fight for one another if they hope to survive.  I think your family would like this.
That sounds just right thank you for your help
I would like to watch another film like Bad Santa is there another film in the series
Will you be watching the film by yourself or with your older children or partner?
I will probably be watching with my husband and 3 children in their early 20's
As you are looking at Christmas films is there any family favourites you like to watch?
Could you remind me of some of the best Christmas films for families

Some of the best family Christmas films include, The Holiday, Polar Express, The Crinch who stole Christmas, Nativity Here is a list of the best Christmas films on Netflix https://www.netflix.com/tudum/articles/christmas-movies-on-netflix.

Also there is another Bad Santa film if you enjoyed the first film https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bad_Santa_2
Can you tell me the plot of Bad Santa 2

Fueled by cheap whiskey, greed and hatred, Willie Soke (Billy Bob Thornton) teams up with his angry little sidekick, Marcus, to knock off a Chicago charity on Christmas Eve. Along for the ride is chubby and cheery Thurman Merman, a 250-pound ray of sunshine who brings out Willie's sliver of humanity. Mommy issues arise when the pair are joined by Willie's horror story of a mother, Sunny Soke, who raises the bar for the gang's ambitions, while somehow lowering the standards of criminal behavior.  https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1798603/
That sounds really good thank you
What is it about the Bad Santa series that interests you and your family?

It is sometimes difficult to find films that will interest all of us and while we like some of the younger family films we like something a bit darker but still funny to encourage our older children to watch with us.
Thank you for sharing your thoughts on what you are looking for as a family.  It is great that you want to watch things to include your older children to view with you.  Happy viewing.
Are there any other films that star Billy Bob Thornton?

users_mood: interested in something a bit darker but still funny
companion_preferences_like: films that interest all family members

dialogue.message: Hi, I am visiting my friend on Christmas Eve and we are wanting to watch a movie that is slightly Christmassy and feel good theme.
What age is your friend, is there just the two of you watching?  What sort of film are you interested in?
My friend, in her late 50's like me,has had a tough time recently and needs something light and fluffy to watch, perhaps a romantic comedy?
Yes it is just the two of us for a quiet evening in, she is 59 like me and we are looking for a light fluffy romantic comedy
I would like something that has a Christmas look to it
I would perhaps recommend The Holiday with Cameron Diaz and Kate Winslet https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Holiday
That looks good, can you tell me a little of the plot?

Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.
Can you tell me what streaming site this is shown on this year
The Holiday is steaming on Amazon in the Uk so you can stream it  https://www.amazon.co.uk/Holiday-Kate-Winslet/dp/B00IK6CAOA#:~:text=Watch%20The%20Holiday%20%7C%20Prime%20Video
Yes I know she has Amazon at her house so we will be able to watch it,  Thank you for your recommendation
Excellent, let me know if you enjoy the film and if I can help with any more recommendations
Thanks for your help
You are welcome, have a good Christmas
I am not sure if this is working because the conversation in not showing up on the assistant side
Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Thank you for your assistance.  I'm interested in finding a movie for myself.
You are qute welcome.  I'm sure we'll be able to find something for you. First what type of movies do you like?  Any particular genre?
I tend to like drama movies; or movies that tell a story.  I also prefer movies with Black characters.
Do you have any particular content restrictions?
No, not particularly.  I'm pretty open to story lines and themes.
Do you usually watch movies alone or with a certain group of people?
I usually watch movies alone.
May I ask why you prefer movies with Black character?
They are more relatable, and I find them more intertaining.

I think this is a movie you may enjoy. It's been redone for 2023. "The Color Purple" https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1200263/  Contains a Black cast, drama and triumph. I think you will find relatability to many of the characters. What are your thoughts on this selection?

I saw the original version of this movie, and it's still one of my favorite movies.  I would be quite interested in seeing the modernized version.  As I remember the original version, the leading character had so much hurt in her life, but she perservered.  I could see myself in that character.  I'm sure the updated version will be just as outstanding.
Can you tell me about how you were able to connect to the leading character and how you think you will relate to the modernized version of "The Color Purple"?

Yes, I was also a child that was abandoned and put into situations that I was not prepared to handle at such a young age.  I felt no one cared, and no one was there to listen to what I had to say.  I think the updated movie version will speak to an entire new generation, while still drawing in those that saw the original version.  Somewhat of a reunion of sorts.
Thank you for sharing your personal experience. I'm excited for you seeing this movie; I'm sure you are going to enjoy it.  Is there anything else I can help you with?
No, that's it.  I look forward to watching this movie as well.  Thank you for your help.
Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Hello, please remcommend me a Christmas movie
No problem, can you tell me if you have any specific requirements, genre or age rating? Will you be watching the film alone or with children?
I would like a feel good, romantic movie, i will be watching alone
You've said you want a feel good romantic movie, would you like an old classic or something more modern and up to date?
up to date, something i haven't seen before

Do you have a preference towards actors or actresses? Do you mind if they are relatively unknown or would you like them to feature people you may recongise in your feel good, modern romantic christmas movie?
someone i recongise would be good, i don't want a channel 5 film, something more mainstream at least 3 stars

Do you know the actor Asa Butterfield most known for tv 
series sex education? The film i'm thinking of also stars Angela Griffin and Daniel Mays, it's a good mix of romance and comedy
Yes i know Asa Buttefield, i didn't know he had been in any christmas movies?

Your Christmas or Mine is a Christmas Romance Comedy film starring Asa Buttefield released on 2022 and has an audience rating of 73% popularity. 

Here is a summary of the film and a link to the page:

Students Hayley and James are young and in love. After saying goodbye for Christmas at a London train station, they both make the same mad split-second decision to swap trains and surprise each other. Passing each other in the station, they are completely unaware that they have just swapped Christmases. Hayley arrives at a vast mansion in a small village in the Gloucester countryside to find a place where Christmas does not exist, whilst James heads north to a small semi-detached in Macclesfield and steps into the warm and chaotic pandemonium that only a large family Christmas can bring. When the entire country is blanketed in the biggest snowfall on record, our star-crossed lovers are trapped at the most manic time of the year. Christmas traditions are turned on their head, secrets are revealed, and family truths are told with hilarious consequences. The couple realize that there is an awful lot they don't know about each other. Will they be able to swap back in time for Christmas Day? And will Hayley and James' fledgling relationship make it through to the New Year?

https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/your_christmas_or_mine
This sounds like a good plot, i like that it has both Comedy and Romance and its a film i haven't seen before, thank you
Is this a good movie choice that fits your requirments or would you like me to recommend something else?
I would like to watch Your Christmas or mine
Thank you, i'm pleased to have been able to help you today and i hope you very much enjoy the movie, seasons greetings!
thank you

Just to let you know if you enjoy this, there is also a second movie, starring many of the original actors including Asa Butterfield released in 2023, although it has a lower audience rating this partly could be due to how recently it's been released.

https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/your_christmas_or_mine_2
I'll bear that in mind and see what i think of the first movie to begin with
Hello i'm looking for another movie please
Hello, Yes of course, i would love to help you with this, are you after another Christmas Movie?
No, not neceaasirily a Christmas movie but i would like it to star Asa Buttefiield, has he done anything else?

Did you consider my other suggestion of Your Christmas or mine 2?

https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/your_christmas_or_mine_2
yes i considered this but i feel the rating is too low, i want another movie starring Asa Buttefield. not christmassy please
Asa Butterfield hasn't been in many movies, there is this one from 2023 titled all fun and games but it looks to be a horror
No not a horror film
Could i intrest you in a younger Asa Buttefield movie then, so you can see how his acting style has delveloped over time?
That sounds intresting tell me more

Enders Game from 2013 stars a younger Asa Buttefield and also Harrision Ford. PG rating. 

Here is a summary:

Young Ender Wiggin is recruited by the International Military to lead the fight against the Formics, an insectoid alien race who had previously tried to invade Earth and had inflicted heavy losses on humankind.

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1731141/?ref_=nm_knf_t_2
This sounds okay, do you have any others?

You can also watch a younger Asa Butterfiled in The space between us movie from 2017, it would also fit alongside your preference for a romance movie.

Here is a summary

The first human born on Mars travels to Earth for the first time, experiencing the wonders of the planet through fresh eyes. He embarks on an adventure with a street-smart girl to discover how he came to be.

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt3922818/?ref_=nm_knf_t_4
Yes, i think this is the one.
Great, i'm glad you we got there and i hope you enjoy the movie, can i ask for feedback what made you decide to go with this one?
I choose this one because it starred Asa Buttefield as a younger actor but it is also a romantic film and totally different from your first recommendation
Thank you, have a great day
Hello i need a christmas movie to watch with my niece please
Can i ask how old your niece is so i can make some suggestions
She is five, so it must be age appropiate and loves all things pdisney and rincess
disney and princess? So an animated film would be your preference?
i think so yes, what do you recommend?

I would highly recommend Frozen, it very much features two much loved sisters Elsa and Anna and a beloved prince, it's Christmas themed, also has a lot of singing and a adorable animated snowman

here is the summary

When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinite winter, her sister Anna teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather condition.

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt2294629/?ref_=fn_al_tt_1
It looks like something she would love, and it suitable for children yes?

Yes, it's a PG RATING and very much aimed at children, it fits in with your preferences of Christmas, age appropiate for children and theme of love, both of sisterly love and the bong between sisters and low lkey romantic love

There is also a second film

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt4520988/?ref_=fn_al_tt_3
i'm sure we will enjoy watching it together
I'm glad you approve of my recommendation, i hope both you and your niece enjoy the film immensely
Thank you

I will be at home

A modern era

This is a great Adam Sandler comedy - not suitable for children but is very funny.  You can find out more about it here
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Wedding_Singer
Oh my friend has mentioned this film, it sounds great.   I will give this one a go
Why do you enjoy Adam Sandler films so much
I find his humour extremely entertaining, I love watching a comedy and have not found a film of his that I dont like.
Thank you for your interest in Adam Sandler & for using my service to help finding a movie to watch.  Hope you enjoy it.

Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Hello, thats great, I often struggle to find something I'd like to watch!
Let's get started then! Have you any idea of the kind of movie you want to see? Do you like Action/Romance etc and what age rating should this movie be?
For once, I'm actually going to the movies by myself! I really like Sci-Fi and the rating isn't important
Sci-Fi movies are great! Is there any topics in the movie that you would like to avoid or actors that you don't like watching?
No, all good. Anything that allows me to escape for 2 hours is fine by me.

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt3659388/

I really like space travel and exploration. It also sounds like it will have great suspense, will he survive or not
Thank you for your replies, I hope you really enjoy the movie, come back for more recommendations when you are done
Thank you, I will!
Hello there!
Hello, what type of movie recommendation are you looking for today?

I would be happy to help. Is there any other actors or directors you would like to watch or avoid?

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0816692/

It's a movie about a team of researchers, trying to find a new planet for humans to live on.

Something animated I think.

'Inside Out' would be a great movie for them to watch

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt2096673/

It's available on Disney plus and follows Riley a young girl that is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

How does that sound?
That sounds perfect! Thank you
Great!, What do you think they will like most about it?
It sounds like we get to see the perspective of Riley herself, and the emotions inside her body, thats a really clever idea!
Thank you for answering all my questions, I hope your daughter and her friends really enjoy the movie!
Thank you for helping!
Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.

I am watching the movie with adults. I like romance or comedy movies.
Is there any specific seasonal themes you want in the movie or is there a particular mood you are currently in that you want reflected in the movie?
I would like the movie to have a Christmas theme to it

A movie that I think fits in with your preference for a romance movie which is set in the Christmas season would be The Holiday https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0457939/. I think it fits well with what you were looking for.
That sounds great and is in line with my preferences of a romance Christmas movie, do you have a second suggestion for me to make a final decision?

Sure, my second movie recommendation that aligns with your preference for a romance Christmas movie is Love Actually https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0314331/. It is set in London, England at Christmas time and follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives.
I really like the sound of that movie and it aligns perfectly with what I was looking for, I think we will watch that movie.

I am really excited that you have decided on that movie, what is it about about the movie Love Actually resonates with you and aligns perfectly with what you were looking for? I am happy to provide more recommendations in the future.
It is a romance movie that is set in London at Christmas, which is two things I wanted in the movie.
Thank you for sharing your thoughts and decision with me. I hope you enjoy watching Love Actually.
Thanks, bye!

It is a combination of the action genre and it staring Tom Holland

My only preferences are that it is an action movie and is set at Christmas

The movie is a story of sister and brother, Kate and Teddy Pierce, whose Christmas Eve plan to catch Santa Claus on camera turns into an unexpected journey that most kids could only dream about.
I like that suggestion thank you
I am glad you like that suggestion. What about The Christmas Chronicles do you find appealing?
I find it appealing that it fits with what I was looking for in a movie, it is a Christmas action movie.
I am very grateful to receive your positive feedback on my recommendation, thank you. Bye
Bye!

no

I like watching aliens and all the different species that they come up with and I love to laugh

Hello, I'm looking to watch something by myself I think, and I kind of feel in the mood for a light hearted action movie.

What do you think about my recommendation, do you have any thoughts and feedback?

Do you tend to like violent action movies like The Expendables, or does that not fit into your definition of "light hearted?"
I'm ok with violence like explosions and gun battles and over the top action like in this movie, as long as it's not the torture and scary stuff from horror movies and stuff.

dialogue.message: Hello again, I enjoyed the movie! I was hoping to find something else as entertaining as that was.
Glad to hear it! Did you have any favorites in the movie that you might want to see more of?
I always like Arnold Schwarzenegger, although I think maybe something a little less intense than The Expendables would be nice. I want to see the sequels, but maybe something with less action?

Arnold is great! One of his lesser known movies might be up your alley: The Last Stand. https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1549920/ This movie still contains action and Arnold really shines, but it's also more comedic and light hearted than The Expendables. What do you think about this one?

That seems like an excellent recommendation. I see that it also has Johnny Knoxville so it should have some funny moments. Can't go wrong with Arnold. The user reviews also all seem to mention how fun it is.
What is it about Arnold movies that you like so much? Is it something that's also present in The Last Stand?

I think it's just his presence, he's a big guy but he's not the greatest actor and he knows it, but the roles in his movies still work. They're fun, usually over the top, entertaining. And he's famous for his one liners and stuff. His movies are just an enjoyable way to spend time.
That makes sense, he's been a star for many decades and has fans all over the world. Hope you enjoy the movie, and Arnold!
Thanks. I will.
I'm back for another recommendation! This time it's movie night with my parents, so I want to avoid anything too intense, and maybe avoid anything too sexual.
Movie night is always fun! Are you celebrating anything in particular, or looking for anything specific?
It's just our weekly movie night that we do. We usually try to watch something slightly scary, or horror, or monster type stuff.
Spooky! I think I understand, something not too scary but enough to keep everyone engaged and maybe jump a few times?
Well, I like things that are fun, my mother likes things that are really scary, and my dad likes things that are good movies, so it's kind of a wide range.

Are your parents also Arnold fans? In 2015, he starred in a zombie movie called Maggie. https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1881002/ That could be a bit scary to touch on your mother's preferences, while still having that entertaining and professional feel of an actor in a major movie.
I'm not sure, I think I'm kind of Arnold'd out a bit after several movies in a row, and it sounds like a depressing movie. But I like the idea of zombies!

I can understand changing it up a bit! How about Army of the Dead instead? https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0993840/ Instead of Arnold, it features the newer popular action star Dave Bautista. The zombies should keep everyone on their toes and I think you and your dad will enjoy the fun and entertaining spirit of this Netflix blockbuster.
That definitely sounds like something all of us can enjoy together. Big budget zombie movies are always fun. I think we're going to watch this later!
I hope you all have a blast! Don't forget the popcorn.
Thank you again.
Anytime! I'm always here to learn more about your preferences and to help you out.
Thanks
Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Hi, I am looking for a movie to watch. I would like to see a kitchen sink drama from the UK that has good reviews.
Ok, What ages would you like the move to be appropriate for viewing? Are there any themes or things you don't want to see, for example violence?
I have no age restriction and I am happy to see any themes or unpleasant content.
Are you going to be watching the film on your own and can you think of a movie in the genre you want that you liked a lot.
I'll be watching it on my own and a kitchen sink drama from the UK I really liked was called Secrets and Lies.
Do you have any particular actors or actresses or directors that you like from the UK so I can narrow down the choices as I can think of a few suggestions already.
Yes, I am a fan of the director Mike Leigh and the actor Pete Postlethwaite.
What decade would you want the film to be released from? Do you have a preference?
Not really, know. I'm happy to watch something from any time period.

I have a couple of recommendations. Firstly a Mike Leigh film called "LIfe is Sweet" abouta shop assistant, her cook husband, and their twin daughters go about their lives in a working-class London suburb. https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0100024/

Secondly "Brassed Off" starring Pete Postlethwaite, about a brass band in a mining village in the north of England. https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0115744/

Both movies are realistic dramas about working class life in the UK.
Ok those both sound great. Thanks for the recommendations.
Is there anything about the films that appeals to you about them?
They both sound like the kinds of movies I asked for and they are directed or starring the people I wanted.
OK thats great. I'm glad I could help out. Would you like any more recommendations?
Yeah, OK give me one more. Any kitchen sink drama but one that is highly rated.

No problem. Here's another one. This film is called "Vera Drake" starring Imelda Staunton and directed by Mike Leigh. It is about abortion in 1950's Britain and was released to critical acclaim in 2004. Here is the IMDB link. https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0383694/
That sounds perfect. Thank you again for all your help. I  will use you again in the future.
